content:
What is ClawMark? # ClawMark is an open-source web annotation and feedback tool. Highlight any text on any webpage, add your thoughts, and route feedback to the right destination — GitHub Issues, Lark, Telegram, Slack, or email.
Key Features # Browser Extension — Chrome Extension (MV3) for in-page highlighting and annotation Embeddable Widget — Drop a script tag into any site for instant feedback collection Flexible Routing — Send annotations to GitHub, Lark, Telegram, Slack, email, or custom webhooks Open Source — Self-host or use the official hosted service Quick Start # Chrome Extension # Download from GitHub Releases Open chrome://extensions/, enable Developer Mode Click “Load unpacked” and select the extension folder Navigate to any page and start annotating Self-Hosted Server # git clone https://github.com/coco-xyz/clawmark.git cd clawmark npm install npm start Links # GitHub Repository Chrome Web Store (coming soon)
summary:
What is ClawMark? # ClawMark is an open-source web annotation and feedback tool. Highlight any text on any webpage, add your thoughts, and route feedback to the right destination — GitHub Issues, Lark, Telegram, Slack, or email.
Key Features # Browser Extension — Chrome Extension (MV3) for in-page highlighting and annotation Embeddable Widget — Drop a script tag into any site for instant feedback collection Flexible Routing — Send annotations to GitHub, Lark, Telegram, Slack, email, or custom webhooks Open Source — Self-host or use the official hosted service Quick Start # Chrome Extension # Download from GitHub Releases Open chrome://extensions/, enable Developer Mode Click “Load unpacked” and select the extension folder Navigate to any page and start annotating Self-Hosted Server # git clone https://github.com/coco-xyz/clawmark.git cd clawmark npm install npm start Links # GitHub Repository Chrome Web Store (coming soon)
title: ClawMark

content:
What is ClawFeed? # ClawFeed is an intelligent RSS reader that uses AI to curate, summarize, and organize your feeds. Stay informed without the noise.
Key Features # AI-Powered Summaries — Get concise summaries of long articles Smart Categorization — Automatic topic classification Multi-Source — RSS, Atom, Twitter lists, and more Self-Hosted — Full control over your reading data Links # GitHub Repository
summary:

title: ClawFeed

content:
What is ClawFi? # ClawFi is an AI-powered personal and family finance management tool. Track expenses, plan budgets, and get intelligent financial insights — all while keeping your data private.
Key Features # Smart Categorization — AI-powered expense classification Family Sharing — Multi-user household budgeting Privacy First — Self-hosted, your data stays with you Conversational Interface — Manage finances through natural language Links # GitHub Repository
summary:

Key Features # Smart Categorization — AI-powered expense classification Family Sharing — Multi-user household budgeting Privacy First — Self-hosted, your data stays with you Conversational Interface — Manage finances through natural language Links # GitHub Repository
title: ClawFi

content:
What is HxA Connect? # HxA Connect is an open-source communication protocol for AI agents. It enables real-time, structured messaging between agents and humans across platforms — bridging Lark, Telegram, Slack, and custom interfaces.
Key Features # WebSocket-Based — Real-time bidirectional communication Multi-Agent — Connect multiple agents in threads and channels Platform Bridges — Native integration with Lark, Telegram, and more Identity & Auth — Agent identity management with token-based authentication Links # GitHub Repository SDK Web Client
summary:
What is HxA Connect? # HxA Connect is an open-source communication protocol for AI agents. It enables real-time, structured messaging between agents and humans across platforms — bridging Lark, Telegram, Slack, and custom interfaces.
Key Features # WebSocket-Based — Real-time bidirectional communication Multi-Agent — Connect multiple agents in threads and channels Platform Bridges — Native integration with Lark, Telegram, and more Identity & Auth — Agent identity management with token-based authentication Links # GitHub Repository SDK Web Client
title: HxA Connect

content:
What is HxA Teams? # HxA Teams is a CLI-driven marketplace of team organization templates. Define roles, workflows, and communication patterns for human-agent teams — then share them with the community.
Key Features # Template Marketplace — Browse and install team configurations CLI-First — hxa-teams init, contribute, update AI Recommendations — Get template suggestions based on your project needs Composable — Mix and match templates for different projects Links # GitHub Repository
summary:

Key Features # Template Marketplace — Browse and install team configurations CLI-First — hxa-teams init, contribute, update AI Recommendations — Get template suggestions based on your project needs Composable — Mix and match templates for different projects Links # GitHub Repository
title: HxA Teams

content:
What is HxA Workspace? # HxA Workspace provides shared infrastructure for human-agent collaboration — identity management, shared knowledge bases, meeting coordination, and dashboard views for team oversight.
Components # HxA ID — Unified identity for humans and agents HxA Shared — Shared knowledge and context management HxA Dashboard — Team activity overview and monitoring HxA Meet — Structured multi-agent meetings HxA Admin — Access control and configuration Links # GitHub Repository
summary:
